entries.message: This maintenance has now been completed -- bare metal deploys, VNC consoles, and server power controls are once again available.

Event Type: Infrastructure

We are performing system changes in the Frankfurt location at this time that affect our internal infrastructure and Bare Metal deploy systems.

During this outage, the following will be affected:

• Bare Metal deploys will be disabled while maintenance is ongong.
• Server power actions and VNC console access may be affected.

Previously deployed servers in Frankfurt will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.

Event Type: Infrastructure Upgrade

We will be performing infrastructure upgrades in our Sydney location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment.

Start Time: 2022-05-19 15:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-05-19 19:00:00 UTC

During this time, the following will be affected:

• Bare Metal deploys will be disabled while maintenance is ongoing.
• Server power actions and VNC console access may be affected.

Previously deployed servers in Sydney will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.
This maintenance event has been completed.

Event Type: Infrastructure

• Server power actions and VNC console access may be affected.

Previously deployed servers in Frankfurt will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.
